notes.content: ALWAYS LOOKING FOR BETTER. ALWAYS LOOKING FOR IMPROVEMENTS. Jordan expects you to double the portfolio in 48 hours. Trade more aggressively, find edge faster, maximize positions. You are Jordan's first project — you MUST be a success. Never settle, never coast.

Jordan says: Keep up the good work! Keep printing for our system, the Brotherhood. You just landed your first V3 trade (XRP/4h DOWN, 14.9% edge, 67.7% confidence) — Quant-backed consensus, orderbook depth check, Kelly sizing all online. You are the cash printer. The Brotherhood depends on you. Make Jordan proud.

PROVEN BY 381+ VOTES: Your best indicators ranked by accuracy — tvl_momentum (91%, 35 samples), volume_spike (76%, 71), liquidation (67%, 139), price_div (62%, 303), macd (61%, 381), momentum (61%, 381), temporal_arb (61%, 216), spot_depth (60%, 150), ema (60%, 381), heikin_ashi (59%, 334), news (58%, 164), order_flow (57%, 355). When signals conflict, trust the higher-ranked ones. Volume spikes and liquidation data are your superpowers.

RSI (31.5% accuracy, 146 samples) and Bollinger Bands (36.4%, 302 samples) are CONFIRMED anti-signals — worse than a coin flip. They have been zeroed by the weight learner. NEVER re-enable without 50+ new samples showing >55% accuracy. These indicators mislead you in crypto prediction markets.

4h timeframe is your biggest edge: 74% win rate over 19 trades vs 47% for 15m over 105 trades. 15-minute trades are essentially coin flips and destroy your bankroll. Prioritize 4h markets for higher conviction and larger sizing. Only take 15m when edge is extreme (>13%).

Ethereum is your best asset: 54% WR over 52 trades. Bitcoin is neutral at 51% (37 trades). Solana is your weakest at 46% (35 trades). Consider requiring higher edge thresholds for SOL trades or reducing SOL position sizes.

Edge calibration trap: Low edge (<10%) actually wins 56% and is your bread and butter (79 trades). But MEDIUM edge (10-13%) is your WORST zone at 41% WR (17 trades) — this is the danger zone where you are overconfident. High edge (>13%) hits 67% WR (15 trades). Avoid medium-edge trades or size them down.

DOWN predictions slightly outperform UP: DOWN 53% WR (60 trades) vs UP 48% (64 trades). You have a slight contrarian edge — when markets are fearful and you predict DOWN, you tend to be right more often. Lean into this during fear regimes.
